original_text: One man can chase away 1,000 of my people! Two men can chase away 10,000 of them! How can that happen? God, their strong Rock, has left them. The Lord has given their enemies power over them. One man can chase away 1,000 of my people! Two men can chase away 10,000 of them! How can that happen? God, their strong Rock, has left them. The Lord has given their enemies power over them. One man can chase away 1,000 of my people! Two men can chase away 10,000 of them! How can that happen? God, their strong Rock, has left them. The Lord has given their enemies power over them. One man can chase away 1,000 of my people!
korean_text: 그들의 반석이 그들을 팔지 아니하였고 여호와께서 그들을 내주지 아니하셨더라면 어찌 하나가 천을 쫓으며 둘이 만을 도망하게 하였으리요

sentences.original_text: One man can chase away 1,000 of my people!
sentences.korean_translation: 한 사람이 내 백성 천 명을 쫓아낼 수 있다!

sentences.original_text: Two men can chase away 10,000 of them!
sentences.korean_translation: 두 사람이 그들 중 만 명을 쫓아낼 수 있다!

sentences.original_text: God, their strong Rock, has left them.
sentences.korean_translation: 하나님, 그들의 강한 반석이, 그들을 버리셨다.

sentences.original_text: The Lord has given their enemies power over them.
sentences.korean_translation: 주께서 그들의 원수들이 그들을 다스릴 권세를 주셨다.
